overview: Three young, highly disturbed women- Honey (Sreejita De), Ayesha (Megha Sharma) and Meera (Ishita Ganguly), trap the property broker Jatin (Rahulganesh Thulsiram). Things take a dark turn when the trio traps him in their apartment and holds him hostage. Can he escape from the grip of these obsessive women? Experience Rescue, a psychologist thriller with a pinch of black comedy.
title: Rescue
